cardData.name: AMINAT OKUNUGA
cardData.text: The 8thGear space is a wonderful workspace. The serene environment, stable power supply , internet facilities, co-working spirit and fun-fridays will definitely make you enjoy your stay

cardData.name: NWAFEJOUNKWU EWERE PRECIOUS
cardData.position: Customer Service Officer, Concrete Colors and Chemicals Nigeria Limited
cardData.text: The few days I spent at the 8thGear Hub were very remarkable. The work environment was very conducive stable power supply and fast internet. The warm reception was superb, I got more than I expected. Thank you, 8thGear Hub. You guys are awesome.
